column5: I am looking for a dog friendly fishing camp out of the Nestor Falls / Morson area on Lake of the Woods. Housekeeping cabin. It is pretty hard to put Joe The Wonder Dog into the kennel for 9 days. He see's you hook up the boat and knows what is going on! Thanks for the help.
Meline's - First time there last year & going back again this year - can't wait! We've got two pooches that do the trip with us every year.http://www.canadafishingtrips.com/
Indian Head Lodge, Sioux Narrows. Tim and Karen great hosts - stayed there twice. Tim good guide and close to great fishing, reasonable rates, house keeping or American Plan.
Spruce Island Camp is dog friendly, I think my dog loves her time there as much as I do.www.spruceislandcamp.com
Young's Wilderness Camp! Great camp, great cabins, pet friendly! Give Perry & Carol a call! (http://youngswildernesscamp.com/)
Tamarack Island Wilderness Lodge: We are dog friendly as well.
